#include <iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
 
int main() {               
	int T,N,i,min=0,* C;
	scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--)
    {   scanf("%d",&N);
	C=new int[N];
	for(i=0;i<N;i++)
	    scanf("%d",&C[i]);
	sort(C,C+N);
	min=C[0];
	if(C[0]!=C[1])
	{       printf("%d\n",min);
		continue;
	}
	for(i=1;(C[i]==C[i-1]||C[i]==C[i+1])&&i<N-1;min=C[++i]);
	printf("%d\n",min);
    }     
	return 0;
}
